item.description:
Meet Chandra at Bare Cove in Hingham for a Saturday morning hike. The trails are wide and flat and the circuit is about 3 1/2 miles long. This is an off leash park with beaches, woods and fields. A wonderful place for the dogs to run and play.

The road in is across the street form the Hingham Commuter Station on Fort Hill St.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside the fire gate, past the Museum, dogs must be leashed in the parking area.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: End of October at Bare Cove
